text: Vakapa kubasa rapatemberi matarenda zviuru zvishanu29:7 matani angaita 170  namadhariki zviuru gumi29:7 matani angaita 84  egoridhe, matarenda zviuru gumi29:7 matani angaita 345  esirivha, matarenda zviuru gumi nezvisere29:7 matani angaita 620  endarira, namatarenda zviuru zana29:7 matani angaita 3,450  esimbi.
